pr_title: Closes #805 - updated to point to osgeo instead of boundless

timeline.message:
Closes #805 - updated to point to osgeo instead of boundless

 . Building from an empty maven repo also required a version of hibernate that did not use the jta 1.0.1B jar

timeline.bodyText:
When building from a clean maven repository, the build failed because it could not download javax.transaction:jta:1.0.1B which is a transitive dependency of hibernate. Checking maven central, it appears that this artifact no longer exists because it is a pom type artifact instead of a jar artifact.
Hibernate is a transitive dependency of org.picketbox:picketbox-infinispan which is used in the web-services/security maven module. This version of hibernate-annotations  depends on a different version of jta, where a jar does exist.
timeline.author: drewfarris
